name: simple-dropzone
description: A simple multi-file drag-and-drop input using vanilla JavaScript.

scripts.dist: browserify --standalone SimpleDropzone index.js -o dist/simple-dropzone.js && uglifyjs dist/simple-dropzone.js --mangle > dist/simple-dropzone.min.js
scripts.version: npm run dist && git add -A dist
scripts.postversion: git push && git push --tags && npm publish

author: Don McCurdy <dm@donmccurdy.com>
